title: Judge of the Darned
description: Spooky Season is here! We are in chambers this week to clear the docket and it's all Halloween! We talk about costumes, trick-or-treating, scaring kids, and much more! Plus we catch up with Friend of the Court and Spirit Halloween expert, Aidan Kaye!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
